input.sentences: we had a great new year 's party last weekend .
my mom bought a huge cake for all of us .
all of my friends show up .

output.sentences: Samantha's friends were very excited for her birthday party.
Her Mom bought her a big cake.
Her friends were excited to eat it.
This kid just brought some glasses from New Years Eve for no reason.
Samantha's friends played hide and seek.
